title: Changing Locale.CFG file doesnt work on new client
body: Am I doing something wrong? I tried to change my locale file on the new client but it isnt working, it only works when I switch back to legacy

replies.body: We don't really support modifying game files, so trying to do so is at your own risk.  It sounds like you're trying to change your game language, but it's not possible to switch it unless it's [ supported by your region](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  You can then switch the language through the patcher itself.  Let me know if that clears things up!
